summary: 1975  was a common year starting on Wednesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1975  was a common year starting on Wednesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1975th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 975th year of the 2nd millennium, the 75th year of the 20th century, and the 6th year of the 1970s decade. It was also declared the International Women's Year by the United Nations and the European Architectural Heritage Year by the Council of Europe.
